QuestData.Title: Taking on All Challengers
QuestData.Description: Let's get you started. The good news is that by defeating Agnetta, you've earned yourself a spot in the next round of matches.$B$BThe bad news is that all your opponents will also have defeated someone in the first round. Do not expect pushovers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lok'lira the Crone in Brunnhildar Village wants you to defeat 6 Victorious Challengers.
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it, $n. You've bested some of the fiercest fighters the Hyldnir race has to offer.
